Package de.lases.business.service

Class PaperService

java.lang.Object
de.lases.business.service.PaperService
@Dependent public class PaperService extends Object
Provides functionality for handling papers in Submissions. In case of an unexpected state, a UIMessage event will be fired.

  • Constructor Details

    • PaperService

      public PaperService()

  • Method Details

    • get

      public Paper get​(Paper paper)
      Gets a paper.

      A Paper may be the paper associated with a submission or a revision.

      Parameters:
      paper - A Paper containing a valid id of the requested paper.
      Returns:
      A fully filled Paper.

    • add

      public void add​(FileDTO file, Paper paper)
      Adds a Paper to a submission.

      Whether this is a submission-pdf or a revision-pdf is determined internally. If this is a revision the editor will be informed by mail about this, using the EmailUtil-utility.

      Parameters:
      file - The FileDTO to be added with the paper, containing a byte[] with the pdf.
      paper - The filled Paper to be added.

    • change

      public void change​(Paper paper)
      Updates a paper.
      Parameters:
      paper - A fully filled Paper-DTO.

      All fields filled with legal values will be overwritten. It should contain an existing id value.

    • remove

      public void remove​(Paper paper)
      Removes a paper from a submission.

      The editor will be informed by mail about this, using the EmailUtil-utility.

      Parameters:
      paper - A Paper-DTO containing a valid paper- and submission id.

    • getFile

      public FileDTO getFile​(Paper paper)
      Returns a requested file.
      Parameters:
      paper - The paper whose file is requested. Must contain a valid id.
      Returns:
      The requested file.

    • getList

      public List<Paper> getList​(Submission submission, User user, ResultListParameters resultListParameters)
      Gets all papers associated with this submission.

      The papers returned are determined by the highest privilege, which that user possesses on that submission.

      Parameters:
      submission - The submission for which the submissions are requested. Must contain a valid id.
      user - The user who requests the papers, containing a valid view-privilege.
      resultListParameters - The parameters, that control filtering and sorting of the resulting list.
      Returns:
      The list of papers of this submission the given user has access to.

    • getLatest

      public Paper getLatest​(Submission submission, User user)
      Returns the latest paper of a submission.

      If there are no revisions for this submission the original Paper is the latest. The paper returned is determined by the highest privilege, which that user possesses on that submission. Meaning he might not have view access on unreleased papers

      Parameters:
      submission - A Submission-DTO containing a valid id.
      user - The user who requests the papers, containing a valid view-privilege.
      Returns:
      The submissions paper, which was least recently uploaded.
